```{r functions, message=F, warning=F}
# Right-aligned rolling average
movingavg <- function(the_data, n_years){
  result = rep(NA, length(the_data))
  for (i in 1:length(the_data)){
    if (i < n_years){
      next
     }
        result[i] = mean(the_data[(i - n_years + 1):i])
    }
  return(result)
}
```
